headline.main: The Secret to Happiness Can Be Found by Digging in the Dirt

docs.abstract: Some research suggests that exposure to soil bacteria could treat not just physical ailments but mental ones, too.
docs.snippet: Some research suggests that exposure to soil bacteria could treat not just physical ailments but mental ones, too.

headline.print_headline: Obama Family Attends Long-Time Aide's Wedding to TV Journalist
headline.main: Obama Family Attends Long-Time Aide's Wedding to TV Journalist

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama, First Lady Michelle Obama and their two daughters on Saturday attended the wedding of their long-time friend and food guru Sam Kass to media personality Alex Wagner at a farm outside New York City, the White House said.
docs.snippet: President Barack Obama, First Lady Michelle Obama and their two daughters on Saturday attended the wedding of their long-time friend and food guru Sam Kass to media personality Alex Wagner at a farm outside New York City, the White House said.

headline.seo: Mockfest, Food Film Fest and Other Niche Programs
headline.print_headline: Film Fests for a Few (Oddballs Especially)
headline.main: Film Fests for a Few (Oddballs Especially)

docs.abstract: Profusion of niche film festivals cater to specific interests and seek to bring together like-minded communities.
docs.lead_paragraph: Beyond mainstream film festivals, screenings aimed at more eclectic audiences seem to be proliferating.
docs.snippet: Beyond mainstream film festivals, screenings aimed at more eclectic audiences seem to be proliferating.
